page.title: 12A PONTESBURY SCHOOLGIRL
page.content: Sarah gets up at 7.30 every weekday. She has cereal and toast for breakfast and then puts on her grey school uniform. She collects the books she needs for her lessons and her pens, pencils and geometry instruments. She cycles to the 'bus stop to catch the School Bus. The school day begins at 9 o'clock. Some days start with Assembly. There are five lessons during the day, with Clubs at lunchtime and after school. There is lunchtime detention for those who misbehave. Sarah studies Maths, English, French, Art, Home Economics, Music, Humanities and Metalwork or Woodwork. Her favourite subject is Art. Every night there is homework, usually two or three subjects. She gets home at 4 o'clock, ready for a typical tea of beefburgers and chips. Sarah goes to bed by 9.30pm.
